programme.title: It's Always Sunny In Philadelphia Yr 16
programme.desc: When news spreads of Bryan Cranston and Aaron Paul's visit to Philadelphia to promote their Dos Hermanos mezcal brand, the Guys decide to pitch them their own liquor. And the Gang takes to the skies to get a taste of the glamorous high life.

programme.title: The Mekong River With Sue Perkins
programme.desc: In this second episode, Sue embarks on the most emotional leg of her journey along the Mekong. Having learnt how people are struggling to recover from the legacy of Pol Pot and the Khmer Rouge, animal lover Sue continues through Cambodia to witness how deforestation and wildlife crime are stripping the country of it last wild places. She goes on a raid with the Wildlife Rapid Response Rescue team, in search of trafficked wild animals and bush meat.

programme.title: Famous Foodies
programme.desc: Famous Foodies tells you about what and where the celebrities eat, from healthy lifestyles to haute cuisine.

programme.title: Asia Unplated With Diana Chan S2
programme.desc: India is a wide-ranging country where cooking varies from region to region, so Diana decides to focus on the foods of Southern India. Jacob Leung (chef and author) prepares Red Onion Bhaji with Yoghurt Dipping Sauce,' his favourite street food snack. Sarah Todd (chef) joins Diana to share her recipe for Kerala Style Crispy Prawns,' a dish she fell in love with while opening a restaurant in India.

programme.title: Anyone Can Sing S1
programme.desc: Six ordinary people who cannot sing are given six weeks to learn how to sing opera with the help of voice coaches.

programme.desc: The squares are short of money and need to get a job. They start a pet sitting service but everything quickly goes downhill when they realise that the life of a pet sitter is not as easy as it looks. A very tired bee leads Ollie and friends to a clearing in the forest where The Imp is trying to steal all the honey for himself. Can they rescue the queen bee before The Imp manages to steal all their honey?

programme.title: Mechamato 'The Animated Series' S1
programme.desc: Mechamato is a Malaysian animated series produced by Animonsta Studios, focusing on a boy named Amato and his partner robot MechaBot, who fight against bad robots. The animated series aired on Cartoon Network Asia from 4 December 2021 to 26 February 2022. Mechamato is a part of the BoBoiBoy franchise and the series also takes place before the original series and BoBoiBoy Galaxy.

programme.title: Sketch 2
programme.desc: In the last season of Sketch, The Bad Fairy, Van, had been defeated. Erwin was named the Keeper' of the Magic Sketch Book but realized to his horror that he has lost his talent for drawing. Erwin has lost his ability to draw, and is dealing with both the loss of his passion for art as well as the repercussions on his Keepership of the book. He realizes that he can no longer perform his duties as the Keeper, and decides to pass the responsibility on to someone else.

programme.title: On The Red Dot - Head Above Water
programme.desc: (Encore) On 21st of July, four men made history by being the first Singaporean relay team successfully swam across the English Channel. What did it take to conquer the treacherous expedition?

programme.desc: With a fresh approach to tackling the issues of the day, Talking Point investigates a current issue or event, offering different perspectives to local stories and reveals how it all affects you.

programme.title: Tanglin

Meera offers Shruti a freelance videography job at SMW, but soon realises that working with her daughter might be a challenge.

programme.title: The Cutting Edge
programme.desc: After a crazy night, Russel informs Zoe that he now knows where his true feelings lie and what he must do. Still processing all that has happened and with the upcoming third and final test, Zoe sets out to clear the air with Ares and prepare for the test. But her road to the top is not without setbacks as she loses her precious sketchbook and finds out who the guest judge for the final test is.

programme.title: After Love
programme.desc: Skylar remains frozen as she hears the story of how Ryan was killed. She now knows that Derek and Ryan are brothers. And that shes not crazy. Well, not completely. But at least she didn't dream of Ryan. He really did exist. Did being the operative word. Skylar doesn't reveal to Derek about her tryst with Ryan. She lies that she has never seen him before and makes a beeline to the exit. Derek is left with no closure once again...

programme.title: 机器人开工了！
programme.desc: (重) 无奇不有的韩国出现人工智能歌唱组合“永恒”，就连新闻主播也是机器人。Delbo把《亚洲新闻台》主播播报新闻的视频，送到韩国去进行加工，结果会如何？可以容纳多达1500名囚犯的史拉兰公园中心，近来也注入了人工智能。除了采用脸部识别系统来点算囚犯人数，数据分析也可以在察觉到牢房里的异样行为后，立刻响起警报。你最近是否曾在街上，看见机器人在工作？疫情带动了送餐服务的需求，有时候甚至出现送餐员供不应求的情况。负责送餐行程最后一英里路的机器人CAMELLO，或许可以解决这个难题。.
